name: Save tray config in Memory
Init flow Variables
Save Settings to File
func:
var jsonPretty = JSON.stringify(global.get('tray'),null,2);
return {topic: msg.payload, payload:jsonPretty};

name: Filter MQTT
func: return {topic:msg.topic.split('/')[4], payload:msg.payload};

name: Publish tray
Save config file
Continue Tray readings
func:
global.set('settingInProgress',false)
return msg;

name: Archive Pulse
Save flow env variables
func:
global.set(msg.topic,msg.payload);
return null;

name: Get pm2Name
func:
msg.payload = global.get("pm2Name");
return msg;

name: Single Archive Pulse
func: return {topic:'archivePulse', payload:true};

name: Pause Readings
func:
global.set('settingInProgress',true)
return msg;

name: Publish fftTray

Publish fftTray
Stop for settings

if (global.get('settingInProgress')) return null;

name: MQTT subscribe topic
func:
let subscribeTopic = flow.get('trayProps').box + "/tray/" + flow.get('trayProps').type +'/' + flow.get('trayProps').name + "/setting/#";
return {action:"subscribe",topic:subscribeTopic};

name: Archive Pulse

func: return {topic:'archivePulse', payload:true};

name: FFT Tray MQTT subscribe topic
func:
let subscribeTopic =  env.get("BOX") + "/tray/" + env.get("FFTTRAYTYPE") +'/' + env.get("FFTTRAYNAME") + "/setting/#";
return {action:"subscribe",topic:subscribeTopic};
